ygData.subject: heritrix 3 example
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, Could someone give me an example for running heritrix 3.0 from within a  standalone java application? I want to be able to set seed URLs and processors

Hi all,
    Could someone give me an example for running heritrix 3.0 from =
within a  standalone java application?
I want to be able to set seed URLs a=
nd processors and so on from within my main method.
A simple crawl job is s=
ufficient.

Thank you,
Balaji
